0.2.name: wordpress/fbvirallike
0.2.description:
Facebook Comments For Wordpress is a plugin that allow you to integrate Facebook Comments Box 2.0 with your wordpress blog.

FcfW add a facebook meta tag into your wordpress header to publish on your commentators wall the following information:

  • Post Title
  • Post first image
  • Post Permalink
  • Post comment
  • Blog's url

If you have FbViralLike Installed you need to upgrade it to the latest version

View Detailed Installation instruction on * http://www.wpcode.net/facebook-comment-for-wordpress-0-1b.html/To have live support for Facebook Comment for Wordpress Join FCfW on facebook:

  • http://goo.gl/oNGX8
